properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 17 at 1:05PM EST until January 18 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Minor lakeshore flooding expected.

* WHERE...Wayne and Monroe Counties.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 4 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property along the
lakeshore. Damage to docks also possible.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southeast wind Saturday increases in
strength during the morning with gusts of 25 to 30 mph. Higher
wave action will lead to increased water levels along the Lake
Erie shoreline leading to intensified lakeshore flooding during
the day Saturday. Winds will then shift to westerly Saturday
night allowing the lakeshore flooding threat to subside.
properties.instruction:
Residents on or near the shore should take appropriate action to
protect property from rising water levels.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM EST SATURDAY
